name: Rockbox Firmware File
summary: Learn about .IPOD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Rockbox Utility is used to install the Rockbox firmware onto supported devices.

description: System file used by Rockbox, a custom firmware for iPods, SanDisk MP3 players, and other portable music players; saves system-level data and bootloader binaries that are used to run the operating system.
